title: Enable checkstyle for test code
description:
To improve the quality of test code, checkstyle should be enabled.

  <executions>
      <execution>
          <id>verifyid>
          <phase>verifyphase>
          <configuration>
              <configLocation>style/rmq_checkstyle.xmlconfigLocation>
              <encoding>UTF-8encoding>
              <consoleOutput>trueconsoleOutput>
              <failsOnError>truefailsOnError>
              
              <includeTestSourceDirectory>falseincludeTestSourceDirectory>
          configuration>
          <goals>
              <goal>checkgoal>
          goals>
      execution>
  executions>
